btrplace.solver.choco.view

Class ModelViewMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.view.ModelViewMapper

  • public class ModelViewMapper
extends Object
    A mapper to associate an ChocoView to a ModelView.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelViewMapper()
      Make a new empty mapper.

      Make a new ModelViewMapper and fulfill it using a default mapper for each bundled view.

      • newBundle

        public static ModelViewMapper newBundle()
        Make a new ModelViewMapper and fulfill it using a default mapper for each bundled view.
        Returns:
        a fulfilled mapper.

      • register

        public boolean register(ChocoModelViewBuilder vb)
        Register a constraint builder.
        Parameters:
        vb - the builder to addDim
        Returns:
        true if no builder previously that registered for the view it handles

      • unRegister

        public boolean unRegister(Class<? extends ModelView> id)
        Un-register the builder associated to a view.
        Parameters:
        id - the view identifier
        Returns:
        true if a builder was registered

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(Class<? extends ModelView> id)
        Check if a ChocoModelViewBuilder is registered to handle a view.
        Parameters:
        id - the view to check
        Returns:
        true iff a builder is registered

      • getBuilder

        public ChocoModelViewBuilder getBuilder(Class<? extends ModelView> id)
        Get the builder registered for a given view.
        Parameters:
        id - the view identifier
        Returns:
        the associated builder if exists. null otherwise
